name: Games for Rats
description:
Games for Rats is a fantasy console and a creative coding tool. Its development started as a sequel to Terrobot and over time transformed it to something completely different, whereas I would be able to create low-fi entries for the One Hour Game Jam. (No idea yet if I will actually do that.)

You can code your own game/app/thing with Small Basic, which is one of the simplest programming languages existing. Games for Rats uses its own API (documentation).

The project is WIP and probably never finished. The lack of a new version does NOT mean that there isn't a new game to play inside the console!
